column5: So I got a giftcard from the kids and wanted to get an inline reel for ice fishing for a while as the "fly reel" I use now for that purpose well, sucks... Anyone use this one? https://www.sail.ca/en/frabill-reel-fly-strl241-256387
yes- works ok, can tangle easy on free spool,like a baitcaster price is right
i had the exact same one. The second i was off the ice it went into the nearest dumpster. my buddie said return it but I said, "i wouldnt return such a piece of $#!& "

i had the exact same one. The second i was off the ice it went into the nearest dumpster. my buddie said return it but I said, "i wouldnt return such a piece of $#!& " Thanks and with that being said I'll pass on it...
